sentences.en: ...a sheet of newspaper.
sentences.cn: …一张报纸。

sentences.en: A gust of wind pried loose a section of sheet-metal roofing.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把铺在屋顶上的一块金属片掀起来了。

sentences.en: a sheet of glass
sentences.cn: 一块玻璃

sentences.en: a sheet of paper with names and numbers on it
sentences.cn: 写了姓名和电话号码的一张纸

sentences.en: Cover with a sheet of non-stick baking parchment.
sentences.cn: 用一张不粘烘焙仿羊皮纸包上。

sentences.en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

sentences.en: He snapped his fingers, and Wilson produced a sheet of paper.
sentences.cn: 他打了个响指，威尔逊便递过一张纸来。

sentences.en: Her naked body was found wrapped in a sheet in a field.
sentences.cn: 在田里发现了她的尸体，全身赤裸，裹在一条床单里。

sentences.en: His head was swathed in bandages made from a torn sheet.
sentences.cn: 他的头上缠满了一层层用床单撕成的绷带。

sentences.en: I should have simply Xeroxed this sheet for you.
sentences.cn: 我应该把这张纸给你复印一下就对了。

sentences.en: I’ll go and find you some clean sheets and blankets.
sentences.cn: 我去给你们找些干净的床单和毯子。

sentences.en: Lay a sheet of newspaper on the floor.
sentences.cn: 在地上铺一张报纸。

sentences.en: Rolls-Royce needed a strong balance sheet.
sentences.cn: 劳斯莱斯公司需要稳健的资产负债表。

sentences.en: She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她拿起一张纸，把它哗哗啦啦地塞到打字机中。

sentences.en: Take a sheet of filo pastry and brush it with melted butter.
sentences.cn: 取一张擀得很薄的油酥面皮，上面刷上一层熔化的牛油。

sentences.en: Tear the sheet of stamps along the perforations.
sentences.cn: 沿齿孔把邮票撕开。

sentences.en: The streets were now in one fierce sheet of flame.
sentences.cn: 街道上现在是一片火海。

sentences.en: Throwing back the sheet, he sprang from the bed.
sentences.cn: 他掀开床单，从床上跳了起来。

sentences.en: Vinyl can be laid in sheet or tile form.
sentences.cn: 塑料地板分为卷材和块材两种。

sentences.en: white cotton sheets
sentences.cn: 白色的棉布床单

words.tran_cn: 用（床单等）包裹；使成大片（sheet的ing形式）
层,表面,薄片,用于包裹或包装之物,地毯
覆盖；盖上被单；使成大片

phrases.tran_cn: 一览表；记录表；数据单表
塑料片材；薄片；塑料薄膜

phrases.phrase: three sheets to the wind 或 three sheets in the wind 【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 有点醉的：中毒的；酒醉的

phrases.phrase: two (或 three) sheets to the wind

trans.tran_cn: 床单，一页/张（纸），纪要，薄板，一层/团/片，拉帆绳
trans.tran_en: a large piece of thin cloth that you put on a bed to lie on or lie under

trans.tran_cn: 覆盖；盖上被单；使成大片
